channel.title: Hamachi Questions [PLEASE LOOK!]
channel.description:
Ok, I'm thinking it's just something i'm missing... but i cant get my hamachi to work right. So here's what i've done so far. Steps: 1] I downloaded Hamachi LogmeIn and created my server with the password and everything. 2] I downloaded Hamachi LogmeIn on my other computer and joined my server with the user and passcode. 3] I kept the Ip address on the computer in step #1 127.0.0.1 for my GUI 4] I changed the Ip address on the computer in step #2 to the Ip address of the server thing i created in my GUI. 5] compiled both
I'm using a Bluur client on the computer in #1 and i downloaded Pkz Vengance client for Computer in step #2.
Results: When i log in on computer in step #1 it works fine and runs properly. No errors on server run.bat what so ever. When i attempt to log in on computer #2 it loads, logs me in and then kicks me right back out every time. and Hamachi works on my computers because i've hosted another private server with it before. So please help me. :confused:

item.title: Hamachi Questions [PLEASE LOOK!]
item.dc:creator: @Boston_Celtics Boston Celtics
item.description:
@Boston_Celtics wrote:

Ok, I’m thinking it’s just something i’m missing… but i cant get my hamachi to work right. So here’s what i’ve done so far.
Steps:
1] I downloaded Hamachi LogmeIn and created my server with the password and everything.
2] I downloaded Hamachi LogmeIn on my other computer and joined my server with the user and passcode.
3] I kept the Ip address on the computer in step #1 127.0.0.1 for my GUI
4] I changed the Ip address on the computer in step #2 to the Ip address of the server thing i created in my GUI.
5] compiled both

I’m using a Bluur client on the computer in #1 and i downloaded Pkz Vengance client for Computer in step #2.

Results: When i log in on computer in step #1 it works fine and runs properly. No errors on server run.bat what so ever.
When i attempt to log in on computer #2 it loads, logs me in and then kicks me right back out every time.
and Hamachi works on my computers because i’ve hosted another private server with it before. So please help me.

Read full topic
